sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import Textarea from '.'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"textarea"}}>{`Textarea`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={'<Textarea />'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea />
</Playground>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={'<Textarea rows={15} placeholder=\"15 rows\" />'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea
    rows={15}
    placeholder='15 rows'
  />
</Playground>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={2} __code={'<Textarea placeholder=\"Disabled Textarea\" disabled />'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea
    placeholder='Disabled Textarea'
    disabled
  />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`import { Textarea } from 'polvokit'
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
